page.title: 07North Burlingham cont
page.content: We discovered that most people worked away from the village and that they mostly went by car.Very few people use bikes bacause it is a long way to go anywhere.People mainly shop in Norwich or as a second choice Yarmouth. There are no shops in the village. One person went to Wroxham, there is a shopping centre there called Roys. Norwich is the biggest shopping centre. Everybody we asked had electricity and water, most of them had a telephone. For heating they had either coal, gas or oil. The gas is from a tank in the garden.Only half the people had mains sewage, the others had septic tanks.
